languages.text: "Отказ от бремени". {n}Кибелла подходит к брату — бесконечно похожему на нее... и совершенно иному.{/n} "Новобранцы Кровавой паутины проходят через него, дабы забыть о прошлом и посвятить себя Неумирающему. И чтобы не страдала душа. Скажи, Маттис... болит ли твоя душа?"

traits.locale_text: "Ю'шин. Ритуал забвения душ". {n}Кибелла подходит к брату — бесконечно похожему на нее и в то же время совершенно иному.{/n} "Новобранцы Кровавой паутины проходят через него, дабы забыть о прошлом и целиком посвятить себя Неумирающему. Но иногда, лишь изредка, нам дозволено проводить его на мирянах. Дабы облегчить страдания их душ. Скажи, Маттис... болит ли твоя душа?"

languages.text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"
languages.original_text: "Отказ от бремени". {n}Кибелла подходит к брату — бесконечно похожему на нее... и совершенно иному.{/n} "Новобранцы Кровавой паутины проходят через него, дабы забыть о прошлом и посвятить себя Неумирающему. И чтобы не страдала душа. Скажи, Маттис... болит ли твоя душа?"

traits.locale_text: "Yuh'shin. The ritual of the oblivion of souls." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

languages.text: « Le rituel de renoncement. {n}Kibellah se rapproche de son frère, qui lui ressemble trait pour trait... tout en étant très différent.{/n} Les nouvelles recrues de la Toile de Sang en passent toutes par là afin d'oublier leur passé et de se consacrer entièrement à l'Immortel, sans pour autant que leur âme en pâtisse. Dis-moi, Mattis, ton âme est-elle tourmentée ? »
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

traits.locale_text: « Le rituel de renoncement. {n}Kibellah se rapproche de son frère, qui lui ressemble trait pour trait... tout en étant très différent.{/n} Les nouvelles recrues de la Toile de Sang en passent toutes par là afin d'oublier leur passé et de se consacrer entièrement à l'Immortel, sans pour autant que leur âme en pâtisse. Dis-moi, Mattis, ton âme est-elle tourmentée ? »

languages.text: «El ritual para la liberación de toda carga». {n}Kibellah se acerca a su hermano, una imagen igual a la suya... pero a la vez completamente diferente.{/n} «La llevan a cabo los nuevos reclutas de la Red Sanguinolenta para olvidar su pasado y prestar sus servicios al Inmortal. Así sus almas no sufren. Dime, Mattis... ¿sufre tu alma?».
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

traits.locale_text: «El ritual para la liberación de toda carga». {n}Kibellah se acerca a su hermano, una imagen igual a la suya... pero a la vez completamente diferente.{/n} «La llevan a cabo los nuevos reclutas de la Red Sanguinolenta para olvidar su pasado y prestar sus servicios al Inmortal. Así sus almas no sufren. Dime, Mattis... ¿sufre tu alma?».

languages.text: 「解放の儀式」{n}キベラは弟に歩み寄る。自分と瓜二つ…だけどまるで違う顔だ。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新しい戦士が、過去を忘れて不死の者に尽くすための儀式だ。儀式を経験して魂が苦しまないようにする。教えてくれ、マティス…お前の魂は苦しんでいるのか？」
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

traits.locale_text: 「解放の儀式」{n}キベラは弟に歩み寄る。自分と瓜二つ…だけどまるで違う顔だ。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新しい戦士が、過去を忘れて不死の者に尽くすための儀式だ。儀式を経験して魂が苦しまないようにする。教えてくれ、マティス…お前の魂は苦しんでいるのか？」

languages.text: “血缚得脱仪式。”{n}绮贝菈走向她的弟弟，他们两人看起来几乎完全相同……却又没有一丝相同之处。{/n}“织血罗网所有新成员都要接受这样的仪式，将自己奉献给不死之神，这样他们的灵魂就不会感到痛苦。告诉我，马蒂斯……你的灵魂痛苦吗？”
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

traits.locale_text: “血缚得脱仪式。”{n}绮贝菈走向她的弟弟，他们两人看起来几乎完全相同……却又没有一丝相同之处。{/n}“织血罗网所有新成员都要接受这样的仪式，将自己奉献给不死之神，这样他们的灵魂就不会感到痛苦。告诉我，马蒂斯……你的灵魂痛苦吗？”

languages.text: "Das Ritual zur Linderung der Last." {n}Kibellah tritt zu ihrem Bruder, der so ganz genau wie sie ist ... und doch so vollkommen anders.{/n}"Neue Rekruten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes durchlaufen es, um ihre Vergangenheit zu vergessen und sich dem Todlosen zu widmen. Und damit ihre Seelen nicht leiden. Sagt, Mattis ... hat Eure Seele Schmerzen?"
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Ritual zur Linderung der Last." {n}Kibellah tritt zu ihrem Bruder, der so ganz genau wie sie ist ... und doch so vollkommen anders.{/n}"Neue Rekruten des Blutgesponnenen Netzes durchlaufen es, um ihre Vergangenheit zu vergessen und sich dem Todlosen zu widmen. Und damit ihre Seelen nicht leiden. Sagt, Mattis ... hat Eure Seelen Schmerzen?"

languages.text: "Yükten azat ayini." {n}Kibellah, baştan aşağı kendisine benzeyen ama... İçten içe bambaşka birisi olan erkek kardeşine doğru adım atıyor.{/n} "Yeni Kanipi Ağı müritleri, geçmişlerini unutmak ve kendilerini Ölmeyen'e adamak için bu ayinde yer alır. Böylelikle ruhları acı çekmez. Mattis, söylesene... Ruhun acıyla kıvranıyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "The ritual of releasing the burden." {n}Kibellah steps up to her brother, who is so completely like her... and yet so thoroughly different.{/n} "New Bloodspun Web recruits undergo it in order to forget their past and devote themselves to the Undying One. And so that their souls do not suffer. Tell me, Mattis... is your soul in pain?"
